title: "Self-driving startup Fabu closes RMB 100 million Series B+"
excerpt: "Autonomous driving startup Fabu on Thursday announced that it has raised around RMB 100 million ($15.4 million) in a Series B+. The investment was co-led by Chinese investment firms Cowin Capital and DYEE Capital."
